import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { Zap, MapPin, Phone, Clock, Navigation, Map, List, Edit3, AlertTriangle, RefreshCw, Target, Route, Power, Calendar, Star } from 'lucide-react'; const EvBunkMapView = () => { const navigate = (path) => { console.log('Navigate to:', path); // Replace with your navigation logic }; const mapRef = useRef(null); // Mock state - replace with your actual state management const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('list'); const [displayBunks, setDisplayBunks] = useState([ { _id: '1', name: 'Tesla Supercharger Downtown', address: '123 Main Street, Downtown District, Udupi', phone: '+91 9876543210', operatingHours: '24/7', slotsAvailable: 8, totalSlots: 12, connectorTypes: ['Type 2', 'CCS', 'CHAdeMO'], distance: 2.5, lat: 13.3409, lng: 74.7421, rating: 4.8, powerOutput: '150kW' }, { _id: '2', name: 'ChargePoint Station Mall', address: '456 Shopping Complex, City Center, Udupi', phone: '+91 9876543211', operatingHours: '6:00 AM - 11:00 PM', slotsAvailable: 0, totalSlots: 6, connectorTypes: ['Type 2', 'CCS'], distance: 4.2, lat: 13.3500, lng: 74.7500, rating: 4.5, powerOutput: '50kW' } ]); const [userLocation, setUserLocation] = useState({ lat: 13.3409, lng: 74.7421 }); const [locationPermission, setLocationPermission] = useState('granted'); const [mapsLoaded, setMapsLoaded] = useState(true); const [map, setMap] = useState(null); // Mock functions - replace with your actual implementations const fetchBunkLocations = () => { setLoading(true); setTimeout(() => setLoading(false), 1000); }; const requestLocationPermission = () => { setLocationPermission('granted'); }; const openInGoogleMaps = (bunk) => { const url = `https://www.google.com/maps?q=${bunk.lat},${bunk.lng}`; window.open(url, '_blank'); }; const handleShowDirections = (bunk) => { console.log('Showing directions to:', bunk.name); }; const clearDirections = () => { console.log('Clearing directions'); }; // Mock AdminNavbar component const AdminNavbar = () => (
EV Admin
); if (loading) { return (

Loading Charging Network

Discovering nearby charging stations...

); } if (error) { return (

{error}

); } return (

Location Access Required

Enable for precise distance and navigation

)}
{/* Premium View Toggle */}
{/* Enhanced Content Section */} {viewMode === 'list' ? ( /* Premium List View */
{displayBunks.length === 0 ? (

No Charging Stations Found

We couldn't locate any charging stations in your area. Please try refreshing or check back later.

) : ( displayBunks.map((bunk) => (
{/* Premium hover effects */}

{bunk.name}

{bunk.rating}
{bunk.address}

)}
{bunk.powerOutput} Fast Charging
0 ? 'bg-gradient-to-r from-green-100 via-green-200 to-emerald-100 text-green-800 border-green-300' : 'bg-gradient-to-r from-red-100 via-red-200 to-rose-100 text-red-800 border-red-300' }`}> {bunk.slotsAvailable}/{bunk.totalSlots} Available
{bunk.phone}
{bunk.operatingHours}
{bunk.connectorTypes && bunk.connectorTypes.length > 0 && (

Available Connectors:

{bunk.connectorTypes.map((connector, index) => ( {connector} ))}
)}
{userLocation && mapsLoaded && ( )}
)) )}
) : ( /* Premium Map View */
{!mapsLoaded ? (

Loading Interactive Map

Preparing your premium charging network experience

) : (
)} {/* Premium Map Controls */}
{displayBunks.length} charging station{displayBunks.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''} displayed on map
{userLocation && ( )}
)}
); }; export default EvBunkMapView;
